name: Garam – LiveChat & ChatBot
author: Minchul Park

sections.description:
Garam is a lightweight customer support solution offers LiveChat and AI-powered auto-reply chatbot.
This plugin is a part of the (Garam – LiveChat & ChatBot platform)[www.garam.io] that uses AI to enhance the user experience on WordPress sites.
Garam website: www.garam.io
Privacy link: Garam Privacy

Garam is a lightweight customer support solution tailored for Shopify users, equipped with the essential tools to elevate your customer service. Our platform offers seamless live chat to engage with customer inquiries and an AI-driven chatbot that handles common questions, freeing up your time to address the more critical pain points. Garam ensures you can provide timely, effective support, helping to enhance customer satisfaction and drive sales

short_description: Garam - LiveChat & ChatBot: A plugin that curates content for easy navigation and a better experience on WordPress
